resources.string: Quiz APP
QUIZ
Less than 35 points - you are in a low risk group, however, it is recommended to have a checkup every two years.
From 35 to 50 points - you are in the middle risk group, it is recommended to have a checkup at least once a year.
Over 50 points - you are at high risk - you are advised to consult your eye doctor immediately!
Your score is:
Click the link below to find out more about glaucoma!
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glaucoma

Yes
No

Question 4. Do you have fat metabolism disorders (overweight)?
Question 5. Do you have elevated blood sugar levels (diabetes)?
Question 6. Do you suffer from the following vascular diseases?
Atherosclerosis
Other
Question 7. Are you in constant stress?
Question 8. Do you have frequent headaches?
Question 9. Do you have cold hands and feet constantly?
Question 10. Are you nearsighted?

[QUIZ] Are you at risk for glaucoma?
Test prepared by the Polish Society of Prophylaxis of Glaucoma in connection with the action: Poland do not blind!
